traits.name: Shadow Step
traits.description: Gains a brief burst of increased movement speed and invisibility when dodging.

traits.name: Arcane Reservoir
traits.description: Increases maximum energy capacity, allowing the mage to use abilities more frequently or for a longer duration.

traits.name: Shield Wall
traits.description: Provides a passive bonus to damage reduction, making the knight more resilient in combat.

traits.name: Eagle Eye
traits.description: Increases critical hit chance and accuracy when using ranged weapons.

traits.name: Rage Frenzy
traits.description: Increases attack speed and damage for a short duration after taking damage.

traits.name: Field Maintenance
traits.description: Reduces cooldowns of abilities and slightly increases the duration of weapon elemental effects.

traits.name: Elemental Mastery
traits.description: Grants a chance for elemental effects to trigger an additional time, doubling the impact of elemental attacks.
